434:1: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvasya bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasyaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi ṣaṭ kāmāvacarā devāḥ sthitā abhūvan - mā bodhisattvasya kaścidantarāyaṃ kārṣīditi|
434:2: evaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimottarā diśo devaiḥ parigṛhītā abhūvan||
434:3: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇastasyāṃ velāyāṃ bodhisattvasaṃcodanīṃ nāma raśmiṃ prāmuñcat,
434:5: atha khalu pūrvasyāṃ diśi vimalāyāṃ lokadhātau vimalaprabhāsasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrāllalitavyūho nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayā prabhayā saṃcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntaiśca bodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmat|
434:6: upasaṃkramya ca tasyāṃ velāyāṃ bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe tathārūpamṛddhyabhisaṃskāramabhisamakarod yenaddharyabhisaṃskāreṇābhisaṃskṛtena daśasu dikṣvākāśadhātuparyavasānāni sarvabuddhakṣetrāṇyekaṃ maṇḍalamātramādarśayati sma śuddhasya nīlavaiḍūryasya |
434:7: pañcagatyupapannānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ purato bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇaṃ bodhisattvamupadarśayati sma|
434:8: te ca sattvāḥ parasparamekāṅgulikābhirbodhisattvamupadarśayanti sma-ko'yamevaṃrūpaḥ sattvo lalitaḥ,
434:10: teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ purato bodhisattvo bodhisattvānnirmimīte sma|
434:11: tatra te bodhisattvavigrahā imā gāthā abhāṣanta—
434:12: yasyā kiṃcana rāgadoṣakaluṣā sā vāsanā uddhṛtā
434:13: yasyā kāyaprabhākṛtā daśadiśe sarve prabhā niṣprabhāḥ|
434:16: atha khalu bhikṣavo dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi ratnavyūhāyā lokadhāto ratnārciṣastathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādratnacchatrakūṭasaṃdarśano nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayā prabhayā saṃcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmat|
434:17: upasaṃkramya bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe ekaratnachatreṇa taṃ sarvāvantaṃ maṇḍalamātraṃ saṃchādayati sma|
434:22: dattā apratimeṣu maitramanasā tiṣṭhanti ke nirvṛte|
434:25: atha khalu paścimāyā diśaścampakavarṇāyā lokadhātoḥ puṣpāvalivanarājikusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādindrajālī nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayā prabhayā saṃcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopajagāma|
434:26: upetya ca bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe sarvāvantaṃ maṇḍalamātramekaratnajālena saṃchādayati sma|
434:27: tatra daśasu dikṣu devanāgayakṣagandharvāḥ parasparamevamāhuḥ-kasyāyamevaṃrūpo prabhāvyūha iti|
434:31: ratnāni trīṇi na ca chetsyati vīryaprāptaḥ
434:32: so bodhi prāpsyati varāmiya tasya pūjā||3||iti||
434:33: atha khalūttarasyāṃ diśi sūryāvartāyā lokadhātoścandrasūryajihmīkaraprabhasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādvyūharājo nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayā prabhayā saṃcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmat|
434:34: upasaṃkramya bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe yāvanto daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāstān sarvāṃstasmin maṇḍalamātre saṃdarśayati sma|
434:36: atha tebhyaḥ sarvavyūhebhya iyaṃ gāthā niścarati sma—
434:37: kāyo yena viśodhitaḥ subahuśaḥ puṇyena jñānena ca
434:38: yenā vāca viśodhitā vratatapaiḥ satyena dharmeṇa ca|
434:39: cittaṃ yena viśodhitaṃ hiridhṛtī kāruṇyamaitryā tathā
434:41: atha khalu pūrvadakṣiṇasyā diśo guṇākarāyā lokadhātorguṇarājaprabhāsasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādruṇamatirnāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayā prabhayā saṃcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmat|
434:42: upasaṃkramya bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe sarvaguṇavyūhaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ tasmin maṇḍalamātre'bhinirmimīte sma|
434:49: atha khalu dakṣiṇapaścimāyā diśo ratnasaṃbhavāyā lokadhāto ratnayaṣṭestathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādratnasaṃbhavo nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayā prabhayā saṃcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmat|
434:54: vyomālaṃkṛta puṣpadāma rucirā udyāna kūpā sabhā
434:55: hastā pāda śirottamāṅganayanāḥ so bodhimaṇḍe sthitaḥ||6||iti||
434:56: atha khalu paścimottarasyā diśo meghavatyā lokadhātormegharājasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrānmeghakūṭābhigarjitasvaro nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayā prabhayā saṃcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmat|
434:57: upasaṃkramya bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe kālānusāryagurumeghamabhinirmāyoragasāracandanacūrṇavarṣaṃ tasmin maṇḍalamātre'bhipravarṣati sma|
434:60: saddharmaṃ ca virāga varṣiṃ amṛtaṃ nirvāṇasaṃprāpakam|
434:63: atha khalūttarapūrvasyā diśo hemajālapratichannāyā lokadhāto ratnacchatrābhyudgatāvabhāsasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrāddhemajālālaṃkṛto nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayāprabhayā saṃcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmat|
434:64: upasaṃkramya bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe sarveṣu teṣu kūṭāgāreṣu ratnavyomakeṣu dvātriṃśallakṣaṇasamalaṃkṛtān bodhisattvavigrahānabhinirmimīte sma|
434:65: sarve ca te bodhisattvavigrahā divyamānuṣyakapuṣpadāmaparigṛhītā yena bodhisattvastenābhinatakāyāstāni puṣpadāmānyabhipralambayanti sma|
434:71: atha khalvadhastāddiśaḥ samantavilokitāyā lokadhātoḥ samantadarśinastathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādratnagarbho nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayā prabhayā saṃcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmat|
434:72: upasaṃkramya bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe tasmin vaidūryamayamaṇḍalamātre jāmbūnadasuvarṇapadmānyabhyudgatānyupadarśayati sma|
434:73: teṣāṃ ca padmānāṃ karṇikāsvardhakāyikā nāryo varṇarūpasaṃpannāḥ sarvālaṃkārapratimaṇḍitā upadarśayati sma|
434:74: vāmadakṣiṇe pāṇibhirharṣakaṭakakeyūrasuvarṇasūtramuktāhārādivividhābharaṇaparigṛhītāḥ puṣpapaṭṭadāmāni cābhipralambayantyo yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenoparyabhinatakāyāḥ|
434:80: atha khalūpariṣṭāddiśo varagaganāyā lokadhātorgaṇendrasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādgaganagañjo nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayā prabhayā saṃcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmat|
434:81: upasaṃkramya bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe gaganatalastha eva yāvanto daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣvadṛṣṭāśrutapūrvāḥ santi puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaravastrālaṃkārachatradhvajapatākāvaijayantiratn-amaṇikanakarajatamuktāhārahayagajarathapattivāhanapuṣpavṛkṣapatrapuṣpaphaladārakadārikā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragaśakrabrahmalokapālamānuṣyāmānuṣyāṇāṃ sarvā gaganatalānmahāntaṃ puṣpavarṣamabhipravarṣanti sma sarvasattvaprītisukhasaṃjananaṃ ca|
434:82: na ca kasyacitsattvasya bhayaṃ cotpīḍāṃ vā karoti sma||
434:88: ke cāgatā nabhasi megha iva stananto
434:95: na ca dṛṣṭapūrva rucirāṇi kṣipanti puṣpāṃ||12||
434:96: ke cāgatā nabhasi sāra ivā ravanto
434:120: ke cāgatā maruta śakra ivā yathaiva
434:147: prekṣanta yāṃ suragaṇā na labhanti tṛptim||25||
434:160: ke cāgatā grahiya bheri yathaiva meru
